name: Galaxy Hero 3
description:
Modified existing 2 scenes and added an intro and ending scenes to explain the game continuation.

- Added destructible wall to first level
- Created background music for every scene
- Updated the Main Menu to match the other 2 previously released games of the Galaxy Hero series.
- There is a way to clear the first level without using the first gate key card.
- Modified gun behavior:

  • Shotgun has 2 shots and then needs to reload
  • Electro gun has 1 shot and then needs to reload

Created By Alvaro Silva
